channel.title: rant on Jarrod Linahan
channel.description: Recent content in rant on Jarrod Linahan

item.title: Should haves; Would haves; Could haves; OR How version control could have saved my ass
item.description: So lately I’ve been working on a few projects in my spare time (Which, I might add, I’ve had a lot of the past few weeks), and things have been going swimmingly. I’m finally coming to grips with the intricacies of Java, and have a little Android app that is almost ripe for the picking. I have also been getting down and dirty with a little Perl, having build a decent framework for a CMS for a friend.

item.title: The Current State of Melbournes Public Transport System
item.description: Tonight after leaving my house for work I was thoroughly dismayed when I found that I’d forgotten to grab my MyKi smartcard before running for the train. I remember a day not all too long ago when this wouldn’t be an issue. You would simply buy a two-hour metcard ticket and be on your way. However tonight after fare evading on the country train I catch to the city, it was much to my discontent that there are now officially no longer any metcard machines in service on the CBD network.
